verses.t: Now{G1161} of{G1909} the things which we have spoken{G3004} this is the sum{G2774}: We have{G2192} such{G5108} an high priest{G749}, who{G3739} is set{G2523} on{G1722} the right hand{G1188} of the throne{G3588} of the Majesty{G3588} in{G1722} the heavens{G3588};
A minister{G3011} of the sanctuary{G39}, and{G2532} of the{G3588} true{G228} tabernacle{G4633}, which{G3739} the Lord{G3588} pitched{G4078}, and{G2532} not{G3756} man{G444}.

For{G1063} every{G3956} high priest{G749} is ordained{G2525} to{G1519} offer{G4374} gifts{G1435} and{G2532} sacrifices{G2378}: wherefore{G3606} it is of necessity{G316} that{G3739} this man{G5126} have{G2192} somewhat{G5100} also{G2532} to offer{G4374}.

For{G1063} if{G1487} he were{G2258} on{G1909} earth{G1093}, he should{G2258} not{G3761} be{G2258} a priest{G2409}, seeing that there are{G5607} priests{G3588} that offer{G4374} gifts{G3588} according{G2596} to the law{G3588}:

Who{G3748} serve{G3000} unto the example{G5262} and{G2532} shadow{G4639} of heavenly things{G2032}, as{G2531} Moses{G3475} was admonished of God{G5537} when he was about{G3195} to make{G2005} the tabernacle{G3588}: for{G1063}, See{G3708}, saith he{G5346}, that thou make{G4160} all things{G3956} according to{G2596} the pattern{G3588} shewed{G1166} to thee{G4671} in{G1722} the mount{G3588}.

But{G1161} now{G3570} hath he obtained a{G5177} more excellent{G1313} ministry{G3009}, by how much{G3745} also{G2532} he is{G2076} the mediator{G3316} of a better{G2909} covenant{G1242}, which{G3748} was established{G3549} upon{G1909} better{G2909} promises{G1860}.
For{G1063} if{G1487} that{G1565} first{G4413} covenant had been{G2258} faultless{G273}, then should no{G3756} place{G5117} have been sought{G2212} for the second{G1208}.

For{G1063} finding fault{G3201} with them{G846}, he saith{G3004}, Behold{G2400}, the days{G2250} come{G2064}, saith{G3004} the Lord{G2962}, when{G2532} I will make{G4931} a{G1242} new{G2537} covenant{G1242} with{G1909} the house{G3588} of Israel{G2474} and{G2532} with{G1909} the house{G3588} of Judah{G2448}:

Not{G3756} according to{G2596} the covenant{G3588} that{G3739} I made{G4160} with{G3588} their{G846} fathers{G3962} in{G1722} the day{G2250} when{G1949} I{G3450} took{G1949} them{G846} by the hand{G3588} to lead{G1806} them{G846} out{G1806} of{G1537} the land{G1093} of Egypt{G125}; because{G3754} they{G846} continued{G1696} not{G3756} in{G1722} my{G3450} covenant{G3588}, and I{G2504} regarded{G272} them{G846} not{G272}, saith{G3004} the Lord{G2962}.

For{G3754} this{G3778} is the covenant{G3588} that{G3739} I will make{G1303} with the house{G3588} of Israel{G2474} after{G3326} those{G1565} days{G3588}, saith{G3004} the Lord{G2962}; I will{G1924} put{G1325} my{G3450} laws{G3551} into{G1519} their{G846} mind{G3588}, and{G2532} write{G1924} them{G846} in{G1909} their{G846} hearts{G2588}: and{G2532} I will be{G2071} to them{G846} a God{G2316}, and{G2532} they{G846} shall be{G2071} to me{G3427} a people{G2992}:

And{G2532} they shall{G1321} not{G3756} teach{G1321} every man{G1538} his{G846} neighbour{G4139}, and{G2532} every man{G1538} his{G846} brother{G3588}, saying{G3004}, Know{G1097} the Lord{G3588}: for{G3754} all{G3956} shall know{G1492} me{G3165}, from{G575} the least{G3398} to{G2193} the greatest{G3173}.

For{G3754} I will be{G2071} merciful{G2436} to{G3588} their{G846} unrighteousness{G93}, and{G2532} their{G846} sins{G3588} and{G2532} their{G846} iniquities{G3588} will I remember{G3415} no{G3756} more{G2089}.

In{G1722} that he saith{G3004}, A new{G2537} covenant, he hath made{G3822} the first{G4413} old{G3822}. Now{G1161} that which decayeth{G3822} and{G2532} waxeth old{G1095} is ready{G1451} to vanish away{G854}.
